prompt: Build a minimalist rating screen with a light gray background and a centered layout. At the top, place a small circular app icon, 60x60 pixels, with a teal-to-green gradient and a white thumbs-up icon. Add a simple 'Rate Our App' title in black, 28px font size. Include a concise centered descriptive text in dark gray, 14px font size, asking for user feedback. Show 5 interactive orange star icons in a horizontal row, each 36px in size. Below, include a compact, rounded teal 'Submit' button and a transparent 'No Thanks' button with a teal border and text, both with 14px font size. Use a Column layout with 16px spacing for a clean, minimal design.
